pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast and Versatile Non-Negative Matrix Factorization // This is a package for Non-Negative Linear Models (NNLM). It implements fast sequential coordinate descent algorithms for non-negative linear regression and non-negative matrix factorization (NMF). It supports mean square error and Kullback-Leibler divergence loss. Many other features are also implemented, including missing value imputation, domain knowledge integration, designable W and H matrices and multiple forms of regularizations.
